data.title: NBA players and coaches react to report of racist comments made by Donald Sterling
data.meta_description: The NBA is investigating whether racially insensitive comments in an audio recording obtained by TMZ were made by Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling.
data.text:
The NBA is investigating whether racially insensitive comments in an audio recording obtained by TMZ were made by Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling. Magic Johnson, who was mentioned in the audio recording, called the comments a “black eye for the NBA” and vowed not to attend Clippers games as long as Sterling is the owner.

As the news spread, many other current and former NBA players and coaches shared their thoughts.
